biotools.summary:
A locus specific database of vitiligo associated genes and variations.

Vitiligo is a complex skin depigmentation disorder characterized by the patchy loss of skin pigmentation.

Vitiligo in-house expression data from lesional and non-lesional epidermal tissue.

bioschemas.name: VitiVar
